body_html:
I wonder whether simply commenting out the bazel clean --expunge at the end of the configure script would lead to problems.
I assume there must be a reason it's there, but I haven't figured out what it might be (assuming that bazel can correctly pick up the changes in all files touched by configure).
body_text:
I wonder whether simply commenting out the bazel clean --expunge at the end of the configure script would lead to problems.
I assume there must be a reason it's there, but I haven't figured out what it might be (assuming that bazel can correctly pick up the changes in all files touched by configure).
body:
I wonder whether simply commenting out the `bazel clean --expunge` at the end of the `configure` script would lead to problems.
I assume there must be a reason it's there, but I haven't figured out what it might be (assuming that bazel can correctly pick up the changes in all files touched by `configure`).
